subdisciplines.name: Algebraic Topology
subdisciplines.description: The study of topological spaces by associating algebraic objects, such as groups, to them, and then studying these algebraic objects.

subdisciplines.name: Differential Topology
subdisciplines.description: The study of smooth manifolds (spaces that locally look like Euclidean space) and the transformations between them.

subdisciplines.name: Geometric Topology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the properties of geometric structures such as curves, surfaces, and hyperbolic manifolds.
